IMIIW, 
Subject: Ex Parte Submission: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB) 
Date: Fri, 02 Aug 2019 22:16:46 +0000 
Attachments: 2019-08-02, JE_ex-parte_discovery_letter.pdf 
To the Chambers of Judge Berman: 
The Government respectfully submits the attached ex parte letter. The letter is respectfully requested to be filed under 
seal, because it discusses victim witnesses. 
Sincerely, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00021547
